DOC.brief_summary: In summary, the researchers want to construct a longitudinal data bank using voluntary health examination participants. Researchers in the National Taiwan University Hospital (NTUH) campus can utilize these data to clarify the effects of several genetic and environmental factors on various common diseases in Taiwan in the future.
DOC.brief_title: Collection of Blood and Urine Specimens From Volunteers Utilizing Health Examination Services
DOC.criteria: Persons who sign informed consent Age below 18 years
DOC.keyword: chronic diseases, such as hypertension, diabetes, obesity, chronic renal failure, and so on
